text: Tappan (, ) from the Lenape word "tuphanne" thought to mean "cold water," is a hamlet and census-designated place in the town of Orangetown, Rockland County, New York, United States. The population was 6,673 at the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Hamlets in New York (state) Category:Census-designated places in New York (state)
title: Tappan, New York
